response.overview: An account of the revolutionary years of the legendary American journalist John Reed, who shared his adventurous professional life with his radical commitment to the socialist revolution in Russia, his dream of spreading its principles among the members of the American working class, and his troubled romantic relationship with the writer Louise Bryant.
response.tagline: Not since Gone with the Wind has there been a great romantic epic like it!
response.title: Reds

titles.title: Reds - Ein Mann kämpft für Gerechtigkeit
John Reed: The Ten Days That Shook the World
The John Reed and Louise Bryant Story
